description: This Java class `SupabaseClient` provides an interface for interacting with a Supabase backend for CRUD operations on 'notes'. It manages network requests using OkHttp, handles JSON parsing, and offers callback-based asynchronous methods for creating, reading, updating, and deleting notes.

classes.name: SupabaseClient
classes.description: A singleton class that manages all network communications with the Supabase backend for notes, including fetching, creating, updating, and deleting notes.

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description: Returns the singleton instance of SupabaseClient, initializing it if necessary using environment variables.

methods.name: getAllNotes
methods.description: Fetches all notes from the database and returns them via the provided callback.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by its ID.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with the given title and content.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by its ID.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.
